abstract: Perdue, as part of expansion plan into specialty meat, announces it is buyer of Niman Ranch, ending weeks of speculation.
lead_paragraph: The purchase of Niman Ranch gives Perdue, a poultry producer, a bigger base in pork and beef.

headline.main: Perdue Buys Niman Ranch, as It Expands in Specialty Meat Business
headline.print_headline: Perdue Expands in Specialty Meat Business

snippet: The purchase of Niman Ranch gives Perdue, a poultry producer, a bigger base in pork and beef.
